mapper.select: SELECT A.LEVEL_CODE AS levelCode ,A.LEVEL_NAME AS levelName FROM PD_CLASSESTREE AS A

SELECT
IFNULL(A.PD_CLASSES_CODE,'') AS classesCode ,IFNULL(B.CLASSES_NAME,'') AS classesName ,IFNULL(A.MACHINING_CODE,'') AS machiningCode
,IFNULL(A.PD_BREED_CODE,'') AS breedCode
,IFNULL(C.MACHINING_NAME,'') AS machiningName ,IFNULL(A.SL_CODE,'') AS slCode ,IFNULL(D.SL_CODE_DIS,'') AS slCodeDis ,A.STATUS_MONITOR_DATE AS statusMonitorDate ,IFNULL(D.SL_CON_FLG,'') AS sl_con_flg ,IFNULL(E.EP_NAME,'') AS epName FROM SL_PRODUCT AS A LEFT JOIN PD_CLASSES B ON A.PD_CLASSES_CODE = B.CLASSES_CODE LEFT JOIN PD_MACHINING C ON A.MACHINING_CODE = C.MACHINING_CODE LEFT JOIN SL_SELLER D ON A.SL_CODE = D.SL_CODE LEFT JOIN SL_ENTERPRISE E ON D.EP_ID = E.EP_ID
GROUP BY A.PD_CLASSES_CODE,A.MACHINING_CODE,A.PD_BREED_CODE
GROUP BY A.PD_CLASSES_CODE,A.MACHINING_CODE
ORDER BY A.PD_CLASSES_CODE,A.MACHINING_CODE,A.PD_BREED_CODE
LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SL_PRODUCT WHERE DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG=0
